entries.title: Elon Musk’s Cuts at Twitter? A Data Center, Janitors, Some Toilet Paper
entries.description: Elon Musk has reduced the company to a bare-bones operation, and employees are under a “zero-based budgeting” mandate to justify any spending.

entries.title: 31 Hours Inside SpaceX Mission Control
entries.description: A reporter got an inside look at SpaceX’s attempt to launch and land three rockets in less than two days in October, part of the company’s bid to make spaceflight appear almost routine.

entries.title: The 2022 Good Tech Awards
entries.description: Nuclear fusion, generative A.I., bee tracking and more. There’s a lot to like.

entries.title: The Tech That Will Invade Our Lives in 2023
entries.description: Say hello to new-and-improved A.I. assistants, and move over to brands like Twitter and Tesla.

entries.title: Twitter Users Report Widespread Service Interruptions
entries.description: The issues surfaced several days after Elon Musk said he had shut down one of the company’s major data centers.
